title: Email Marketing Services Page

fields.label: Hero Heading Line 1
fields.name: email_hero_heading_line_1
fields.instructions: First line of the hero H1.

fields.label: Hero Heading Line 2
fields.name: email_hero_heading_line_2
fields.instructions: Second line of the hero H1. Can include span highlight HTML.

fields.label: Hero Description
fields.name: email_hero_description
fields.instructions: Short paragraph under the hero heading.

fields.label: Hero Background Type
fields.name: email_hero_background_type
fields.instructions: Choose hero background type.

fields.label: Hero Background Image
fields.name: email_hero_background_image
fields.instructions: Used when background type is Image.

fields.label: Hero Background Video (MP4)
fields.name: email_hero_background_video_mp4
fields.instructions: MP4 video source, used when background type is Video.

fields.label: Hero Background Video (WebM)
fields.name: email_hero_background_video_webm
fields.instructions: Optional WebM video source.

fields.label: Hero Background Video Poster
fields.name: email_hero_background_video_poster
fields.instructions: Optional poster image for video background.

fields.label: Hero Background Overlay Opacity
fields.name: email_hero_background_overlay_opacity
fields.instructions: Opacity between 0 and 1.

fields.label: Hero Primary Button
fields.name: email_hero_primary_button
fields.instructions: Main CTA button.

fields.label: Hero Secondary Button
fields.name: email_hero_secondary_button
fields.instructions: Secondary CTA button (not currently rendered in template, but available).

fields.label: Stats
fields.name: email_stats
fields.instructions: Key statistics to show under the hero.

fields.label: Heading Line 1
fields.name: email_what_is_heading_line1
fields.instructions: First line of the heading (e.g. What is).

fields.label: Heading Line 2
fields.name: email_what_is_heading_line2
fields.instructions: Second line of the heading (e.g. Email Marketing?).

fields.label: Content
fields.name: email_what_is_content
fields.instructions: Main explanatory body content.

fields.label: Image
fields.name: email_what_is_image
fields.instructions: Side image for the section.

fields.label: Button
fields.name: email_what_is_button
fields.instructions: CTA button for this section.

fields.label: Label
fields.name: email_long_cta1_label
fields.instructions: Small label above the heading (e.g. READY TO CONNECT?).

fields.label: Heading Line 1
fields.name: email_long_cta1_heading_line1
fields.instructions: First line of the CTA heading.

fields.label: Heading Line 2
fields.name: email_long_cta1_heading_line2
fields.instructions: Second line of the CTA heading.

fields.label: Text
fields.name: email_long_cta1_text
fields.instructions: Optional supporting paragraph under CTA heading.

fields.label: Features
fields.name: email_long_cta1_features
fields.instructions: Feature bullets under the CTA (icon + title + description).

sub_fields.label: Icon SVG
sub_fields.name: icon_svg
sub_fields.instructions: Raw inline SVG markup for the feature icon.

fields.label: Primary Button
fields.name: email_long_cta1_primary_button
fields.instructions: Primary CTA button.

fields.label: Secondary Button
fields.name: email_long_cta1_secondary_button
fields.instructions: Secondary CTA button (phone etc.).

fields.label: Services Label
fields.name: email_services_label
fields.instructions: Small label above services section heading (e.g. What We Offer).

fields.label: Services Heading
fields.name: email_services_heading
fields.instructions: Main heading for services grid.

fields.label: Services Subheading
fields.name: email_services_subheading
fields.instructions: Short paragraph under the services heading.

fields.label: Services
fields.name: email_services
fields.instructions: Main email marketing services (first 4 shown).

sub_fields.label: Icon SVG
sub_fields.name: icon_svg
sub_fields.instructions: Inline SVG icon for this service.

fields.label: Heading Line 1
fields.name: email_sells_heading_line1
fields.instructions: First heading line (e.g. Emails That).

fields.label: Image

fields.instructions: Side image for the section.

fields.label: Button
fields.name: email_sells_button
fields.instructions: CTA button for this section.

fields.label: Process Label

fields.instructions: Small label above process heading (e.g. How We Work).

fields.label: Process Heading
fields.name: email_process_heading
fields.instructions: Main heading for the process/timeline section.

fields.label: Process Subheading
fields.name: email_process_subheading
fields.instructions: Short paragraph under the process heading.

fields.label: Process Steps
fields.name: email_process_steps
fields.instructions: Steps displayed in the email process timeline.

fields.name: email_faq_heading
